sentences.en: He has a proclivity for exaggeration.
He has a proclivity to [ toward ] violence .
sentences.cn: 他有 暴力 的倾向.

sentences.en: He has a proclivity toward violence.
Now there was added a proclivity to emulate the scale of French colonial rule.
sentences.cn: 现在又增加了一种要同法国殖民统治规模媲美的倾向.

trans.tran_en: a tendency to behave in a particular way, or to like a particular thing – used especially about something bad
